A Few Words About Me

My name is Vitor Campanhã and I’m a graduate Electrical Enginneer and a self-taught Frontend Developer.

Portuguese Air Force Serviceman, specialized in Electronic Mechanic, with a high mission spirit, sense of discipline and camaraderie.
I am communicative, organized, ambitious, curious and self-taught, always in search of new ideas and matters of study, to expand my range of knowledge.
I'm looking for competitive organizations, that can challenge me and help me grow more and more, either as a person and as a professional.
